name: Vandals
resolution: This event ends when you succeed at the check.
description: Vandals, troublemakers, and dissidents destroy property in your settlement

criticalSuccess.msg: You root out the vandals and stop them from causing any damage.

success.msg: The vandals are caught in the act of damaging an area in your settlement. The event ends, but @lose2ResourceDiceNextTurn

failure.msg: The vandals damage and deface several minor structures in the settlement and remain uncaught for now. Fortunately, the damage done can be easily repaired, but <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="lose" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="4">Lose 4 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

criticalFailure.msg: The vandals also manage to reduce one structure (chosen by the players) to rubble. @gain1d4Unrest and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="lose" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="4">Lose 4 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>
